question: PSLV-C50 is going to launch which communication satellite from Satish Dhawan Space Centre?
explanation: PSLV-C50, which is the 52<sup>nd</sup> mission of PSLV, is going to launch CMS-01 from the Second Launch Pad (SLP) of Satish Dhawan Space Centre , Sriharikota. CMS-01 is a communication satellite envisaged for providing services in Extended-C Band of the frequency spectrum. CMS-01 is the 42<sup>nd</sup> Communication Satellite of India.
